thread.title: Exercise Device by InventHelp Client Allows For More Effective, Pain-Free Situps (LGI-2026)
thread.title_full: Exercise Device by InventHelp Client Allows For More Effective, Pain-Free Situps (LGI-2026) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Exercise Device by InventHelp Client Allows For More Effective, Pain-Free Situps (LGI-2026)
text:
InventHelp, founded in 1984, is submitting this idea, PERFECT SIT UP, to companies for their review and potential feedback.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 23, 2015
Situps are a great way to exercise and work out the abdominal muscles, but they can hurt the buttocks and the backâ€™s llumbar region. In order to solve this problem, an inventor from East Elmhurst, N.Y., designed a special exercise device.
The easy-to-use PERFECT SIT UP provides a more comfortable way to do situps. It avoids pain in the buttocks and lumbar region of the back, which allows for more effective exercise. Overall, it promotes fitness, weight loss and abdominal strength. The idea is patent pending.
The original design was submitted to the Long Island office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-LGI-2026, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
